verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came again unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, there were two <S%H8147><s%> women <S%H802><s%>, the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> mother <S%H517><s%>:

And they committed whoredoms <S%H2181><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; they committed whoredoms <S%H2181><s%> in their youth <S%H5271><s%>: there were their breasts <S%H7699><s%> pressed <S%H4600><s%>, and there they bruised <S%H6213><s%> the teats <S%H1717><s%> of their virginity <S%H1331><s%>.

And the names <S%H8034><s%> of them were Aholah <S%H170><s%> the elder <S%H1419><s%>, and Aholibah <S%H172><s%> her sister <S%H269><s%>: and they were mine, and they bare <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>. Thus were their names <S%H8034><s%>; Samaria <S%H8111><s%> is Aholah <S%H170><s%>, and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> Aholibah <S%H172><s%>.

And Aholah <S%H170><s%> played the harlot <S%H2181><s%> when she was mine <S%H8478><s%>; and she doted <S%H5689><s%> on her lovers <S%H157><s%>, on the Assyrians <S%H804><s%> her neighbours <S%H7138><s%>,

Which were clothed <S%H3847><s%> with blue <S%H8504><s%>, captains <S%H6346><s%> and rulers <S%H5461><s%>, all of them desirable <S%H2531><s%> young men <S%H970><s%>, horsemen <S%H6571><s%> riding <S%H7392><s%> upon horses <S%H5483><s%>.

Thus she committed <S%H5414><s%> her whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> with them, with all them that were the chosen <S%H4005><s%> men <S%H1121><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%>, and with all on whom she doted <S%H5689><s%>: with all their idols <S%H1544><s%> she defiled <S%H2930><s%> herself.

Neither left <S%H5800><s%> she her whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> brought from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: for in her youth <S%H5271><s%> they lay <S%H7901><s%> with her, and they bruised <S%H6213><s%> the breasts <S%H1717><s%> of her virginity <S%H1331><s%>, and poured <S%H8210><s%> their whoredom <S%H8457><s%> upon her.

Wherefore I have delivered <S%H5414><s%> her into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of her lovers <S%H157><s%>, into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Assyrians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H804><s%>, upon whom she doted <S%H5689><s%>.

These discovered <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>: they took <S%H3947><s%> her sons <S%H1121><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and slew <S%H2026><s%> her with the sword <S%H2719><s%>: and she became famous <S%H8034><s%> among women <S%H802><s%>; for they had executed <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H8196><s%> upon her.

And when her sister <S%H269><s%> Aholibah <S%H172><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> this, she was more corrupt <S%H7843><s%> in her inordinate love <S%H5691><s%> than she, and in her whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> more than her sister <S%H269><s%> in her whoredoms <S%H2183><s%>.

She doted <S%H5689><s%> upon the Assyrians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H804><s%> her neighbours <S%H7138><s%>, captains <S%H6346><s%> and rulers <S%H5461><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> most gorgeously <S%H4358><s%>, horsemen <S%H6571><s%> riding <S%H7392><s%> upon horses <S%H5483><s%>, all of them desirable <S%H2531><s%> young men <S%H970><s%>.
Then I saw <S%H7200><s%> that she was defiled <S%H2930><s%>, that they took both <S%H8147><s%> one <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>,

And that she increased <S%H3254><s%> her whoredoms <S%H8457><s%>: for when she saw <S%H7200><s%> men <S%H582><s%> pourtrayed <S%H2707><s%> upon the wall <S%H7023><s%>, the images <S%H6754><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> pourtrayed <S%H2710><s%> with vermilion <S%H8350><s%>,

Girded <S%H2289><s%> with girdles <S%H232><s%> upon their loins <S%H4975><s%>, exceeding <S%H5628><s%> in dyed attire <S%H2871><s%> upon their heads <S%H7218><s%>, all of them princes <S%H7991><s%> to look to <S%H4758><s%>, after the manner <S%H1823><s%> of the Babylonians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H894><s%> of Chaldea <S%H3778><s%>, the land <S%H776><s%> of their nativity <S%H4138><s%>:
And as soon as she saw <S%H4758><s%> them with her eyes <S%H5869><s%>, she doted <S%H5689><s%> upon them, and sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto them into Chaldea <S%H3778><s%>.

And the Babylonians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H894><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to her into the bed <S%H4904><s%> of love <S%H1730><s%>, and they defiled <S%H2930><s%> her with their whoredom <S%H8457><s%>, and she was polluted <S%H2930><s%> with them, and her mind <S%H5315><s%> was alienated <S%H3363><s%> from them.

So she discovered <S%H1540><s%> her whoredoms <S%H8457><s%>, and discovered <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>: then my mind <S%H5315><s%> was alienated <S%H3363><s%> from her, like as my mind <S%H5315><s%> was alienated <S%H5361><s%> from her sister <S%H269><s%>.

Yet she multiplied <S%H7235><s%> her whoredoms <S%H8457><s%>, in calling to remembrance <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of her youth <S%H5271><s%>, wherein she had played the harlot <S%H2181><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

For she doted <S%H5689><s%> upon their paramours <S%H6370><s%>, whose flesh <S%H1320><s%> is as the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of asses <S%H2543><s%>, and whose issue <S%H2231><s%> is like the issue <S%H2231><s%> of horses <S%H5483><s%>.

Thus thou calledst to remembrance <S%H6485><s%> the lewdness <S%H2154><s%> of thy youth <S%H5271><s%>, in bruising <S%H6213><s%> thy teats <S%H1717><s%> by the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> for the paps <S%H7699><s%> of thy youth <S%H5271><s%>.

¶ Therefore, O Aholibah <S%H172><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I will raise up <S%H5782><s%> thy lovers <S%H157><s%> against thee, from whom thy mind <S%H5315><s%> is alienated <S%H5361><s%>, and I will bring <S%H935><s%> them against thee on every side <S%H5439><s%>;

The Babylonians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H894><s%>, and all the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>, Pekod <S%H6489><s%>, and Shoa <S%H7772><s%>, and Koa <S%H6970><s%>, and all the Assyrians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H804><s%> with them: all of them desirable <S%H2531><s%> young men <S%H970><s%>, captains <S%H6346><s%> and rulers <S%H5461><s%>, great lords <S%H7991><s%> and renowned <S%H7121><s%>, all of them riding <S%H7392><s%> upon horses <S%H5483><s%>.

And they shall come <S%H935><s%> against thee with chariots <S%H2021><s%>, wagons <S%H7393><s%>, and wheels <S%H1534><s%>, and with an assembly <S%H6951><s%> of people <S%H5971><s%>, which shall set <S%H7760><s%> against thee buckler <S%H6793><s%> and shield <S%H4043><s%> and helmet <S%H6959><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>: and I will set <S%H5414><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, and they shall judge <S%H8199><s%> thee according to their judgments <S%H4941><s%>.

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> against thee, and they shall deal <S%H6213><s%> furiously <S%H2534><s%> with thee: they shall take away <S%H5493><s%> thy nose <S%H639><s%> and thine ears <S%H241><s%>; and thy remnant <S%H319><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>: they shall take <S%H3947><s%> thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%>; and thy residue <S%H319><s%> shall be devoured <S%H398><s%> by the fire <S%H784><s%>.
They shall also strip <S%H6584><s%> thee out of thy clothes <S%H899><s%>, and take away <S%H3947><s%> thy fair <S%H8597><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%>.

Thus will I make thy lewdness <S%H2154><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> from thee, and thy whoredom <S%H2184><s%> brought from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: so that thou shalt not lift up <S%H5375><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> unto them, nor remember <S%H2142><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> any more.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> thee into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of them whom thou hatest <S%H8130><s%>, into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of them from whom thy mind <S%H5315><s%> is alienated <S%H5361><s%>:

And they shall deal <S%H6213><s%> with thee hatefully <S%H8135><s%>, and shall take away <S%H3947><s%> all thy labour <S%H3018><s%>, and shall leave <S%H5800><s%> thee naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare <S%H6181><s%>: and the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy whoredoms <S%H2183><s%> shall be discovered <S%H1540><s%>, both thy lewdness <S%H2154><s%> and thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%>.

I will do <S%H6213><s%> these things unto thee, because thou hast gone a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and because thou art polluted <S%H2930><s%> with their idols <S%H1544><s%>.
Thou hast walked <S%H1980><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of thy sister <S%H269><s%>; therefore will I give <S%H5414><s%> her cup <S%H3563><s%> into thine hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Thou shalt drink <S%H8354><s%> of thy sister's <S%H269><s%> cup <S%H3563><s%> deep <S%H6013><s%> and large <S%H7342><s%>: thou shalt be laughed to scorn <S%H6712><s%> and had in derision <S%H3933><s%>; it containeth <S%H3557><s%> much <S%H4767><s%>.

Thou shalt be filled <S%H4390><s%> with drunkenness <S%H7943><s%> and sorrow <S%H3015><s%>, with the cup <S%H3563><s%> of astonishment <S%H8047><s%> and desolation <S%H8077><s%>, with the cup <S%H3563><s%> of thy sister <S%H269><s%> Samaria <S%H8111><s%>.

Thou shalt even drink <S%H8354><s%> it and suck it out <S%H4680><s%>, and thou shalt break <S%H1633><s%> the sherds <S%H2789><s%> thereof, and pluck off <S%H5423><s%> thine own breasts <S%H7699><s%>: for I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Because thou hast forgotten <S%H7911><s%> me, and cast <S%H7993><s%> me behind <S%H310><s%> thy back <S%H1458><s%>, therefore bear <S%H5375><s%> thou also thy lewdness <S%H2154><s%> and thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%>.

¶ The LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> moreover unto me; Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, wilt thou judge <S%H8199><s%> Aholah <S%H170><s%> and Aholibah <S%H172><s%>? yea, declare <S%H5046><s%> unto them their abominations <S%H8441><s%>;

That they have committed adultery <S%H5003><s%>, and blood <S%H1818><s%> is in their hands <S%H3027><s%>, and with their idols <S%H1544><s%> have they committed adultery <S%H5003><s%>, and have also caused their sons <S%H1121><s%>, whom they bare <S%H3205><s%> unto me, to pass for them through <S%H5674><s%> the fire, to devour <S%H402><s%> them.

Moreover this they have done <S%H6213><s%> unto me: they have defiled <S%H2930><s%> my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> in the same day <S%H3117><s%>, and have profaned <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>.

For when they had slain <S%H7819><s%> their children <S%H1121><s%> to their idols <S%H1544><s%>, then they came <S%H935><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%> into my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> to profane <S%H2490><s%> it; and, lo, thus have they done <S%H6213><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of mine house <S%H1004><s%>.

And furthermore <S%H637><s%>, that ye have sent <S%H7971><s%> for men <S%H582><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> from far <S%H4801><s%>, unto whom a messenger <S%H4397><s%> was sent <S%H7971><s%>; and, lo, they came <S%H935><s%>: for whom thou didst wash <S%H7364><s%> thyself, paintedst <S%H3583><s%> thy eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and deckedst <S%H5710><s%> thyself with ornaments <S%H5716><s%>,

And satest <S%H3427><s%> upon a stately <S%H3520><s%> bed <S%H4296><s%>, and a table <S%H7979><s%> prepared <S%H6186><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> it, whereupon thou hast set <S%H7760><s%> mine incense <S%H7004><s%> and mine oil <S%H8081><s%>.

And a voice <S%H6963><s%> of a multitude <S%H1995><s%> being at ease <S%H7961><s%> was with her: and with the men <S%H582><s%> of the common sort <S%H7230><s%> <S%H120><s%> were brought <S%H935><s%> Sabeans <S%H5436><s%> <S%H5433><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, which put <S%H5414><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> upon their hands <S%H3027><s%>, and beautiful <S%H8597><s%> crowns <S%H5850><s%> upon their heads <S%H7218><s%>.
Then said <S%H559><s%> I unto her that was old <S%H1087><s%> in adulteries <S%H5004><s%>, Will they now commit <S%H2181><s%> whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> with her, and she with them?

Yet they went in <S%H935><s%> unto her, as they go in <S%H935><s%> unto a woman <S%H802><s%> that playeth the harlot <S%H2181><s%>: so went they in <S%H935><s%> unto Aholah <S%H170><s%> and unto Aholibah <S%H172><s%>, the lewd <S%H2154><s%> women <S%H802><s%>.

¶ And the righteous <S%H6662><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, they shall judge <S%H8199><s%> them after the manner <S%H4941><s%> of adulteresses <S%H5003><s%>, and after the manner <S%H4941><s%> of women that shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>; because they are adulteresses <S%H5003><s%>, and blood <S%H1818><s%> is in their hands <S%H3027><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; I will bring up <S%H5927><s%> a company <S%H6951><s%> upon them, and will give <S%H5414><s%> them to be removed <S%H2189><s%> and spoiled <S%H957><s%>.

And the company <S%H6951><s%> shall stone <S%H7275><s%> them with stones <S%H68><s%>, and dispatch <S%H1254><s%> them with their swords <S%H2719><s%>; they shall slay <S%H2026><s%> their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and burn up <S%H8313><s%> their houses <S%H1004><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

Thus will I cause lewdness <S%H2154><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%>, that all women <S%H802><s%> may be taught <S%H3256><s%> not to do <S%H6213><s%> after your lewdness <S%H2154><s%>.

And they shall recompense <S%H5414><s%> your lewdness <S%H2154><s%> upon you, and ye shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the sins <S%H2399><s%> of your idols <S%H1544><s%>: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.
